column4: hello , after i downloaded ubuntu 8.10 and burned it on cd , after boot and while it try to load ubuntu it give me this error http://paste.ubuntu.com/65304/ ? what is wrong with it ?
have you downloaded the oxygen theme from the internet? When you get it, it should have a some_file_name.emerald  to install it.

hey kebomix  I saw your error. I think that you burnt the CD at a high speed. Can you burn the ISO at the LOWEST speed possible?  I know it sounds silly, but burning at high speed can cause errors on the CD
ok i thought that too , i will try and  come back to u , thanks :)
